analyzed: nam bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa na sems can gang gis nged kyi ming thos sam /

analyzed: de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur cig /

translated: May I be born in a pure buddha realm, in the presence of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas, and may I be completely free from the eight unfavorable conditions.

original: de nas shi 'phos na'ang lhag mar bcas pas yongs su 'dzin par shog cig /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos na'ang lhag mar bcas pas yongs su 'dzin par shog cig /
translated: And when I die and transmigrate, may I be reborn in the presence of the Blessed One, the thus-gone, worthy, perfectly awakened Buddha AmitÄbha.

original: 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das par shog cig /
analyzed: 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das par shog cig /
translated: May I be completely free from all fears.

original: gang gis de @145b bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan 'dzin pa de dag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par zungs shig /
